KOUSA: But what brings you here to my humble workshop today, my friend?

PLUME: Kousa, do you not recall? You urged me to visit your workshop today to show me a new invention of yours!

PLUME: You mentioned a device engineered with help from the <color=orange>Sunless City,</color> that would help our expedition team weather the terrible storms we have faced on our expedition?

KOUSA: Ah, yes, I recall now.. I wished to show you the storm shelter!

KOUSA: The storm shelter uses gravity crystals to powers a gravitational field to hold Nomai in place when islands are ejected into orbit.
9 8
KOUSA: Thanks to the <color=orange>Sunless City's</color> contributions, the device is able to autonomously power itself upon entering orbit, and even deactivates on its own afterwards to conserve power!

KOUSA: I believe it would be easier to demonstrate than explain..
